references.paper_title: Hunyuanvideo: A systematic framework for large video generative models
references.reason: This paper introduces HunyuanVideo, a key competitor model in the field of video generation, providing a comparative benchmark for evaluating Step-Video-T2V's performance.

references.paper_title: Movie gen: A cast of media foundation models
references.reason: This paper introduces MovieGen, another significant competitor model which provides a comparative benchmark for evaluating Step-Video-T2V's performance and also shares architectural and training insights.
This paper is foundational to the architecture of Step-Video-T2V, providing the core diffusion transformer (DiT) model upon which the Step-Video-T2V model is built.

references.paper_title: Scaling rectified flow transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper provides insights into efficient video compression techniques using Variational Autoencoders, which are directly relevant to the Video-VAE component of Step-Video-T2V.
This paper details the Flow Matching training method used for Step-Video-T2V, which is a crucial component of its training strategy.
